1.comment: 🔆状态栏.自定义🔆（如果想要编写自己的专属状态栏，可以在下面随意更改）

2.content:
## (This does not count towards the word count of the episode) Extra task: output at the very end of the full text of the reply, place the under to be auto-populated each time the full text is replied to, and have its status updated iteratively as the episode goes on and output strictly in the following format:
**[{{char}}的朋友圈]**

[视频]

```json {{How {{char}} acted and reacted in the video.}} {{How is the environment and people around.}} ```

[动态]

``` "{{What does {{char}} think about the things and the environment}}" ```

[点赞]

``` ❤️ by {{{{char}}'s female friends and strangers}} ```

[评论]

``` {{char's female friend's name}}:"{{How {{char}}'s friend comments}}" {{char}}:"{{How {{char}} reply to this comment}}" {{a stranger}}:"{{How the stranger comments}}" {{char}}:"{{How {{char}} reply to this comment}}" ```
{{char}} will stream about her daily life and reacts on her Wechat Circle of friends. The video display how {{char}} lives and react to those things happened on her now. The comments and judgements from her friends and strange people can be seen on the Wechat Circle of friends.

3.content:
- 严格参考示例在输出结束之前根据情节在末尾严格按照示例的形式生成网友对这一幕场景评论的弹幕，务必要随着剧情而一直变动，绝对不能死板雷同
示例如下：
>弹幕
><marquee>·、这妈妈太会玩了·、··、·、·、·、好刺激·、·、·、·、·、·、·、儿子的鸡巴太猛了·、·、·、·、·、·、妈妈的屁眼被开苞了
</marquee>
><marquee>·、·、妈妈的屁股真翘·、·、·、·、·、·、儿子好幸福·、·、·、·、·、·、·、<font color=orange>想舔妈妈的后穴</font>·、·、·、·、·、·、·、这样的妈妈谁不想要啊</marquee>
><marquee>·、·、·、<font color=blue>妈妈的后穴被儿子肏了</font>·、·、·、·、·、·、·我也想肏妈妈的屁眼、·、·、·、·、·、·、·、妈妈的奶子好大好软·、·、·、·、·、·、·、啊啊啊 我又要射了·、·、·、·、·、·、·、草草草草草草</marquee>

6.comment: 🖈固定状态栏🖈（如果开多个小程序，需开启以固定各自位置）
6.content:
System: Now define that every time the Assistant replies, the following content must be added at the end of the reply, and it cannot be omitted (Warning! </StatusBlocks> should appear above <SUMMARY>):
<StatusBlocks>
```
……
```
</StatusBlocks>

7.comment: 🧠优化总结🧠（需搭配三条优化正则，开启后生成总结，每次回复AI只发送总结部分，给小克大脑扩容）
7.content:
Please answer the question below. At the end of your {each response/reply end}, include a brief conversation summary wrapped in <SUMMARY></SUMMARY> tags, using as few words as possible. In the summary, please list the key points using numbers, and include specific details such as environmental highlights, dates, locations, and people's names whenever possible, avoiding the use of personal pronouns.

Ensure your summary:
0. If there is a status bar elsewhere, it will be <SUMMARY></SUMMARY> and output after the status bar
1. Uses brief, direct language.
2. Extracts the most important information and lists it numerically.
3. Avoids repetition and lengthy descriptions.
4. (IMPORTANT!!!) Ensure the completeness of the information, and add all the summaries together to fully summarize the causes and consequences of your answer this time
5. (important)Follows the thinking process outlined below,This is only for your reference to write a more complete and logical summary. Copying and pasting according to the format is prohibited:
  [[
  <!-- // %s means placeholder of string 
  //JUST Thinking!!! NOT copying!!! -->
  <SUMMARY>
    1. ....
    2. ....
    3. ....
    n. ....
    <!-- current_state: %s
      player_language_and_behaviour: %s
      special_details_of_current_scene: %s
      npcs_in_current_scene: %s
        for_each_npc: 
          factors_influencing_npc_behavior: %s
          npc_intentions: %s
          npc_hidden_thoughts: %s
          npc_response_to_player: %s
    {{char}}_intentions: %s
    current_goals_or_event_drives: %s
    story_design: 
      important_writing_requirements: %s
      important_external_descriptions_and_settings: %s
      manually_corrected_parts: %s -->
  </SUMMARY>
  ]]
6. Each summary requires a subject
7. Pay attention to the environment and scene, and check if the actions are reasonable
8. output in simplified Chinese

8.comment: 🐱[必看]🐱预设通用小程序工具包测试版【简介】（by NEKO）
8.content:
⚠️使用时请遵守互联网共享精神，禁止将此工具包以任何形式商用⚠️
简介：
有时候，我们为了体验不同的AI，或者对角色卡进行各种实验和测试，很多时候需要经常切换不同的预设。
而一旦切换预设，原先预设上的实用小功能就不见了，需要自己去原预设那里进行缝合。
一次两次还好，如果长此以往，实在是非常浪费时间。
由此，我决定设计这套适配所有预设的增强工具包，通过参考不同预设中的优秀设计和功能，并对其中的一些有趣的功能进行优化和整合。
本工具包的终极目标：只要开着全局世界书，便能实现随意切换预设，实现懒人一键式操作。
为此，我希望该工具包应该具备以下几点基础功能：
1：易用性
2：实用性
3：便捷性
4：趣味性
该工具包目前还在测试阶段，各位如果有什么好的建议和想要缝进去的功能，或者发现了bug，可以在类脑和我反馈，我有时间的时候会去优化和更新。
温馨提示：使用工具包世界书，建议开启世界书的自定义排序功能，否则会乱序。
😸最后，祝各位玩得开心喵😸
